title: The tech workers scripting a return to roots - Mint
content: The tech workers scripting a return to roots  Mint
description: With thousands of techies choosing to go back amid the pandemic, non-metro centres are becoming tech hubs.Thanks to this massive shift on the ground, tier-2 cities such as Coimbatore, Madurai, Chandigarh and Bhubaneswar are fast becoming hubs for software services and talent
